content.title: Binding validate Function to Button
content.body:
1. Copy paste the code below the validate function, inside define:

    onNavigate: function() {
    this.view.loginButton.onClick = this.validate.bind(this);
    },

    The onNavigate function is invoked when the control is passed to the form. The onClick action of the button is now linked with the validate function.
  2. Save your file by clicking ctrl+shift+s on Windows and cmd+shift+s on Mac.
